text: The Christian Bloc () is an electoral bloc in Ukraine. In the 30 September 2007 elections, the bloc failed to win parliamentary representation, winning 0,10% of the votes. „Всеукраїнська Політична партія – Екологія та Соціальний захист“, Database DATA Member parties: *Social-Christian Party *All-Ukrainian Political Party "Ecology and Social Protection" ==References== Category:Political party alliances in Ukraine
title: Christian Bloc
